Books - Food Analysis Methods¶

BFM1

C. J. Bates and R. A. Meyers. Vitamins, fat and water soluble analysis; encyclopaedia of analytical chemistry - item 1. John Wiley, Chichester, UK, 2000. Reference data: VIT; VITB12; Radio-isotopic; http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Radionuclide.

BFM2

C. J. Bates and R. A. Meyers. Vitamins, fat and water soluble analysis; encyclopaedia of analytical chemistry - item 2. John Wiley, Chichester, UK, 2000. Reference data: VIT; GRP_VITD; m00011.
